|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9412G6JH-5I; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = B4:C7:99

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48DNUA0E.0GA 2012/06/05" <small>(or something like that)</small> :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{See also|Extreme Networks|Wistron NeWeb}}
==See also== ===Models=== *''Extreme Networks KHUSB601'' - 802.11a/b/g/n USB module :FCC ID QXO-KHUSB601 (''Extreme Networks, Inc.'') • [https://fcc.report/company/Extreme-Networks QXO] *''Zebra Technologies KHUSB601'' - 802.11a/b/g/n USB module :FCC ID: UZ7KHUSB601 (''Zebra Technologies Corporation'') • [https://electric.garden/zebra-uz7 UZ7]
